item.title: Pacquiao nomination as PDP-Laban presidential bet a drama, says Cusi faction
item.description: “We are not surprised; we expect them to do that. The ouster of President (Rodrigo) Duterte (as party chairman replaced by Senator Koko Pimentel), that was a comedy. The proclamation (of Pacquiao), that s drama. Hopefully, it would not end up for them as a tragedy,” lawyer Melvin Matibag of the Cusi group said.

item.title: House panel denies Gaite's motion to adopt testimonies of Pharmally execs in Senate probe
item.description: "Since nagkaroon nga po ng hearings sa Senate blue ribbon committee and the officials of Pharmally have testimonies under oath and are now part of public record, I move that the testimonies, in particular, of Pharmally be included as part of our records in our hearing at the House of Representatives under the good committee," Gaite said.

item.title: 155 COVID-19 deaths each day recorded in August -DOH
item.description: At least 155 deaths from COVID-19 were recorded in the Philippines each day in August, the highest since the pandemic began early last year.

item.title: Mayor Isko, kinumpirma ang pulong kina VP Robredo at Sen. Pacquiao
item.description: Kinumpirma ni Manila Mayor Isko Moreno nitong Lunes ang pakikipagpulong niya kina Vice President Leni Robredo at Senador Manny Pacquiao patungkol sa Eleksyon 2022.

item.title: Makabayan Bloc seeks additional tax for wealthiest of the wealthy
item.description: The House Makabayan Bloc filed a bill on Monday seeking to impose an additional tax on the "wealthiest of the wealthy."

item.title: Prince Andrew may challenge UK ruling on US sex case --court
item.description: A British court on Friday said Prince Andrew's legal team had been given seven days to challenge a decision to notify him about a US civil case accusing him of sexual assault.

item.title: Laos locks down capital as COVID-19 cases hit record high
item.description: Reclusive Laos has locked down its capital Vientiane and barred travel between COVID-hit provinces, as cases soared to a record high.

item.title: Limited face-to-face classes, inaprubahan ni Duterte--Roque
item.description: Inaprubahan ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte ang pagpapatupad ng limited face-to-face classes sa mga lugar na mababa ang kaso ng hawahan ng COVID-19, ayon sa Malacañang.

item.title: 10k COVID-19 vaccine doses wasted within acceptable range --DOH
item.description: “When we look at the number of vaccines that were already provided to the population, which is about 40 plus million already, [and] comparing [this] to 10,000, this would yield a very, very small percentage,” Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said in an online briefing.

item.title: At least eight dead in Russian campus shooting
item.description: A student opened fire on a university campus in central Russia on Monday killing at least eight people, investigators said, in the second mass shooting at an education facility this year.

item.title: Philippines logs 18,937 new COVID-19 cases; active tally at 176K
item.description: The Philippines on Monday registered 18,937 additional COVID-19 cases, raising the total tally to 2,385,616.The Department of Health (DOH) case bulletin also showed that the active cases decreased to 176,850 from 178,196 recorded on September 19.

item.title: 68-anyos na lalaki, tinangka raw manghalay ng babae sa tindahan
item.description: Huli ang isang 68-anyos na lalaki matapos niyang tangkain umanong gahasain ang isang 33-anyos na babae sa loob ng isang tindahan sa Lazi, Siquijor.

item.title: Roque clears Duterte over involvement in Davao Death Squad
item.description: Presidential spokesperson Harry Roque on Monday cleared President Rodrigo Duterte of involvement in the Davao Death Squad.

item.title: 1Sambayan sees VP Leni, Isko as possible standard bearer in Eleksyon 2022, says Etta
item.description: A member of 1Sambayan on Monday said the opposition coalition is still "divided" when it comes to who will be their standard bearer in next year's election but said Vice President Leni Robredo and Manila Mayor Isko Moreno are contenders.

item.title: 97 areas across the country under COVID-19 Alert Level 4 -DOH
item.description: Nearly 100 areas in the Philippines are under the highest alert level for COVID-19, the Department of Health (DOH) said Monday.
